resources.string: Order the news feed by most recent
The blue bar will remain stuck on the top.
The background will be black and the text white. (Good for AMOLED displays)
There not will be sponsored posts!
Creator and developer of the app
I chose to do it for free. Can you offer me a coffee?
Try to check the connection and refresh.
This is an Open Source app.

To download SlimFacebook you have to:
 - Open https://play.google.com/apps/testing/it.rignanese.leo.slimfacebook 
 - Login in Google (if you aren't already logged)
 - Push "Become a tester"
 - Open this with the Play Store App: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=it.rignanese.leo.slimfacebook
Opening browser you can download or share this image.
Without they, I couldn\'t add some attractive functions. If you are a developer, you have to see their massive work!
No personal or private information about you or your device is collected or trasmetted by this app !
